verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you are my <S%H430>God.<s%> I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> <S%H3034>you!<s%> I will praise your <S%H8034>name,<s%> for you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6382>wonderful<s%> <S%H6098>things,<s%> things planned long <S%H7350>ago,<s%> in complete <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and <S%H544>truth.<s%>

For you have <S%H7760>made<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> into a <S%H1530>heap,<s%> a <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> into a <S%H4654>ruin,<s%> a <S%H759>palace<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%> to be no <S%H5892>city.<s%> It will <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H1129>built.<s%>
Therefore a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> <S%H7151>you.<s%> A city of <S%H6184>awesome<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> will fear <S%H3372>you.<s%>

For you have been a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H34>needy<s%> in his <S%H6862>distress,<s%> a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> from the <S%H2230>storm,<s%> a <S%H6738>shade<s%> from the <S%H2721>heat,<s%> when the <S%H7307>blast<s%> of the dreaded <S%H6184>ones<s%> is like a <S%H2230>storm<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

As the <S%H2721>heat<s%> in a dry <S%H6724>place<s%> will you bring <S%H3665>down<s%> the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers;<s%> as the <S%H2721>heat<s%> by the <S%H6738>shade<s%> of a <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> the <S%H2159>song<s%> of the dreaded <S%H6184>ones<s%> will be brought <S%H6030>low.<s%>

In this <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will <S%H6213>make<s%> all <S%H5971>peoples<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> of fat <S%H8081>things,<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> of choice <S%H8105>wines,<s%> of fat <S%H8081>things<s%> full of <S%H4229>marrow,<s%> of well <S%H2212>refined<s%> choice <S%H8105>wines.<s%>

He will <S%H1104>destroy<s%> in this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H3875>covering<s%> that <S%H3874>covers<s%> all <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and the <S%H4541>veil<s%> that is <S%H5259>spread<s%> over all <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

He has swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H5331>forever!<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> will wipe <S%H4229>away<s%> <S%H1832>tears<s%> from off all <S%H6440>faces.<s%> He will take the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from off all the <S%H776>earth,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>

It shall be <S%H559>said<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H430>"Behold,<s%> this is our God! We have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H3467>him,<s%> and he will save <S%H3068>us!<s%> This is Yahweh! We have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H1523>him.<s%> We will be glad and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H3444>salvation!<s%>"

For in this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5117>rest.<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will be trodden <S%H1758>down<s%> in his <S%H4963>place,<s%> even like straw is trodden <S%H1758>down<s%> in the water of the <S%H4087>dunghill.<s%>

He will spread <S%H6566>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> in its <S%H7130>midst,<s%> like one who <S%H7811>swims<s%> spreads <S%H6566>out<s%> hands to <S%H7811>swim,<s%> but his <S%H1346>pride<s%> will be <S%H8213>humbled<s%> together with the <S%H698>craft<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

He has brought the <S%H4869>high<s%> <S%H4013>fortress<s%> of your <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H7817>down,<s%> laid <S%H8213>low,<s%> and <S%H5060>brought<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> even to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
